const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      group: {
        type: "keyword",
      },
      user: {
        type: "nested",
        properties: {
          first: {
            type: "keyword",
          },
          last: {
            type: "keyword",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    group: "fans",
    user: [
      {
        first: "John",
        last: "Smith",
      },
      {
        first: "Alice",
        last: "White",
      },
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  fields: ["*"],
  _source: false,
});
console.log(response2);
